scripts.dev:electronapp: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND,ELECTRON -c yellow,cyan,green "npm --prefix frontend run dev:frontend" "npm --prefix backend run dev:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && tsc --project electron/tsconfig.json && electron ."
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron
scripts.dist: npm run build && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.licenses: npm --prefix frontend run licenses && npm --prefix backend run licenses
